content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
No composite on‐map structures have been successfully created. Several attempts were made to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) by placing or crafting one, but all such actions failed. Although furnace entities were referenced for smelting operations (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper), these were used solely for resource processing and do not constitute built composite structures within the scope of this report.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
• API Parameter Usage – When using get_entities, ensure that the function is called with the correct parameters. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as 'radius') or providing positional arguments if none are expected.
  
• Inventory & Placement Validation – Verify that necessary items are available in inventory before attempting to place a structure. Ensure that the target location is valid and available to avoid placement errors.

• Null Response Handling – Check that functions returning collections (for example, get_entities) do not return None before iterating. Use an empty list fallback to prevent TypeError situations when the expected iterable is missing.
  
• Recipe & Resource Sufficiency – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients and production prerequisites (e.g., for crafting a Lab, including items like iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available in the needed quantities before initiating the craft. This helps avoid crafting failures due to resource shortages.
